Module org.eclipse.persistence.core
Package org.eclipse.persistence.internal.helper

Interface SimpleDatabaseType

All Superinterfaces:
DatabaseType
All Known Subinterfaces:
JDBCType, OraclePLSQLType
All Known Implementing Classes:
JDBCTypes, OraclePLSQLTypes, PLSQLCollection, PLSQLCursor, PLSQLrecord
public interface SimpleDatabaseType extends DatabaseType
PUBLIC: Marker interface for Simple Database types (e.g. JDBC types, PL/SQL BOOLEAN, etc.)
Since:
Oracle TopLink 11.x.x
